utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you realize that four weeks from today we’re getting married? Four weeks baby!! Four weeks!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you realize you get louder each week?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There’s still so much to do. Have you written your vows yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I figured I’d buy those. Pat, I’d like to buy a vow.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sweetie, you know I have no sense of humor when it comes to the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right. So uh, have you written yours yet?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! But I know exactly what I’m going to say.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you happen to know what I’m going to say?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let’s just do it right now. Okay? It won’t be hard. Just say what’s in your heart.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look at her go! She must love me more than I love her! What’s wrong with me? Ooh, don’t open that door.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica, there are no words… There are no words! This should not be this hard!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, uh… Oh hey, you’ve done this before Ross, well what did you say when you made up your vows?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well with Carol, I promised never to love another woman until the day I die. She made no such promise.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m so pathetic! Monica knows what she wants to say! You should’ve seen her. Writing, writing, writing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is the emergency?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You have to help me! I’m supposed to be writing my vows and all I have is this!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I like the pretty little drawing of you in the wedding dress.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, except your breasts look kinda small.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Those are my eyes! Those are my breasts.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, why don’t you just start with something simple. Like umm, Monica from the moment I met you, I knew I loved you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m not sure I can do that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...everyone, this is Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Fat Monica
utterance.content: Hi, I'm Ross's little sister.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Okay. Umm, maybe you can start with, "Chandler, even though we were friends; there was a part of me that always knew I wanted more."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, there’s a nuclear holocaust, I’m the last man on Earth. Would you go out with me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ennnh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh, are we allowed to lie in the vows?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well maybe you don’t talk about your feelings back then. Maybe you just say something about y’know all the things that he’s taught you. Like… Or all the things you taught him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now everybody knows the basic erogenous zones. You got one, two three, four , five, six, and seven!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There are seven?! That’s one?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s kind of an important one!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, y’know-y’know what, I was looking at it upside down.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y’know, sometimes that helps.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I got it! How about saying something like, "Monica…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: "…when I look back over our time together…"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I can’t do everything! Look back over your time together.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look, twins. Hi, guys. Oh, cute, cute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No fair. I don't even have one. How come they get two?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You'll get one.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah? When?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right. I'll tell you what. When we're 40, if neither one of us are married, what do you say you and I get together and have one?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why won't I be married when I'm 40?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, no, no. I just meant hypothetically.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, hypothetically, why won't I be married when I'm 40?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no, no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is it? Is there something fundamentally unmarriable about me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, uh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dear God! This parachute is a knapsack!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m getting married today!! Ahh, whoo-hoo!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you think he knew I was here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice try.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, wait, wait!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, Monica…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is not going to work.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I bet this will work!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are so great! I love you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothing! I said, I said "You're so great" and then I just, I just stopped talking!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You said you loved me! I can't believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, you did!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No I didn't!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You love me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No I don't! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then all your stuff would be here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what if all my stuff was here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it doesn’t make any sense.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m saying?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You wanted it to be a surprise.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler… In all my life… I never thought I would be so lucky. As to…fall in love with my best…my best… There’s a reason why girls don’t do this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay! I'll do it! Oh God, I thought… Wait a minute, I-I can do this. I thought that it mattered what I said or where I said it. Then I realized the only thing that matters is that you, you make me happier than I ever thought I could be. And if you’ll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way. Monica, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can we come it yet?! We’re dying out here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come in! Come in! We’re engaged!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, what have you guys been up to?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, we were helping Chandler write his vows, but he kicked us out because Joey kept making inappropriate suggestions.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How is "Monica, I love your sweet ass," inappropriate?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How’s Monica coming along with her vows?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well let’s just say its she’s lucky she has a sweet ass, ‘cause she’s not so good at the writing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t believe in four weeks they’re gonna be married!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well let’s just hope it works. Y’know nine out of ten marriages end in divorce?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe that’s not true.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you’re right. How’s the Mrs.?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can’t believe they’ve been together for three years.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Has it been that long?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Believe me, it seems like less because they hid it from us for so long.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, it's me! I'm comin' in!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I've had a very long, hard day.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahh, I'm gonna go get some chicken. Want some?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, no thanks. No chicken, bye-bye then.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you okay? I'm so sorry, he wouldn't leave. He kept asking me about chicken.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chicken? I could eat some chicken.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, can I get a 3-piece, some cole slaw, some beans, and a Coke——Diet Coke.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know why they didn’t just tell us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know! I mean it’s not like we weren’t cool about it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You?! And-and you?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, but you cannot tell anyone! No one knows!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How?! When?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It happened in London.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: IN LONDON!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The reason we didn't tell anyone was because we didn't want to make a big deal out of it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it is a big deal!! I have to tell someone!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no! You can't!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please? Please?! We just don't want to deal with telling everyone, okay? Just promise you won't tell.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Man, this is unbelievable!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't wait to be with you! I'll just tell Rachel I'm gonna be doing laundry for a couple of hours.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Laundry. Huh. Is that my new nickname?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Awww, y'know what your nickname is, Mr. Big…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Arghh!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look! There's Monica and Chandler! Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: CHANDLER AND MONICA!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH MY GOD!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It's okay!! It's okay!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: NO! THEY'RE DOING IT!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YOU KNOW?!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn't know so you have to stop screaming!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: HI!! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing! Oh God, we're just so excited that you want to get this apartment!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Actually, it looks really good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get in here!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, so now they know that you know and they don't know that Rachel knows?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes, but y'know what? It doesn't matter who knows what. Now, enough of us know that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would finally be over!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our own

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right honey, we'd better go if we wanna catch that movie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye Chandler! I miss you already.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate and the pinching!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Actually, I did!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so now do you believe that she's attracted to me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe knows about us!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well I didn't tell them!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Them?! Who's them?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And Rachel. I would've told you but they made me promise not to tell!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But see they don't know that we know that they know! So…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! Oh my God! He wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you kidding?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I can not believe he would do that to Mon—Whoa! Joey, do they know that we know?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They know you know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God, they thought they can mess with us! They're trying to mess with us?! They don't know that we know they know we know! Joey, you can't say anything!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I couldn't even if I wanted too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put lotion on her!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's bluffing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, she's not backing down! She went like this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He's not backing down. He went to get lotion.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh man! Aren't you guys done yet?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler the sooner this is all over and out in the open.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like that! Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He's afraid of bras! Can't work 'em!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey! Wow, you didn’t rip off any buttons.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's not my first time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You go back out there and you seduce her till she cracks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, give me a second! Did you clean up in here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you're-you're going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, not without you, lover. So, this is my bra.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's very, very nice. Well, come here. I'm very happy were gonna have all the sex.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You should be. I'm very bendy. I'm gonna kiss you now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not if I kiss you first.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I guess there's nothing left for us to do but-but kiss.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here it comes. Our first kiss.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can't have sex with ya!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And why not?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because I'm in love with Monica!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're-you're what?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Love her! That's right, I…LOVE…HER!!! I love her!! I love you, Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you too Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I just—I thought you guys were doing it, I didn't know you were in love!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So that's it! It's over! Everybody knows!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well actually, Ross doesn't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, and we'd appreciate it if no one told him yet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! Wh… What are you doing?!! GET OFF MY SISTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, you’re friend’s getting married, it’s gotta change things.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You really think it would be that different?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How could it not be? I mean pretty soon they’re gonna be having kids, and then they’re just gonna be hanging out with other couples who have kids. And then maybe they’re gonna have to leave the city to be near a Volvo dealership.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, things change.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t want them to move to a Volvo dealership!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’ll be okay Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sorry, I just…I like things the way they are.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, who's this little naked guy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That little naked guy would be me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aww, look at the little thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes, fine, that is my penis. Can we be grown-ups now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who are those people?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Got me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, that's Nana, right there in the middle. 'Me and the gang at Java Joe's'.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, Monica, you look just like your grandmother. How old was she there?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let's see, 1939... yeah, 24, 25?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Looks like a fun gang.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, look-look-look-look-look! I got Monica naked!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nono, that would be me again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, you guys!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, we were just talkin’ about you guys gettin’ married and how great it is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you can get a Volvo. If that’s what you really want.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s so sweet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So we both finished our vows.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, can we read them?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I don’t hear Chandler’s and he doesn’t hear mine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, that’s beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Funny one! That’s good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, will-will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? I don’t get it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh man, this is hilarious.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don’t worry honey, we’ll make yours funnier.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, what do you guys think?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I have never known love like this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You really like it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude! How-how did you write this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I stole Monica’s and changed the name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If he goes first he can!
